DocAttribute.Name: PredefinedType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Identifies the predefined types of a work plan from which the type required may be set.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The attribute ObjectType must be asserted when the value of the IfcWorkPlanTypeEnum is set to USERDEFINED.
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(PredefinedType)) OR (PredefinedType <> IfcWorkPlanTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) OR ((PredefinedType = IfcWorkPlanTypeEnum.USERDEFINED) AND EXISTS(SELF\IfcObject.ObjectType))
